name: Video Creatomate Agent
description: Agent responsible for generating video scripts with captions using Creatomate
context: Used for generating video content with customizable captions in the video generation workflow
author: AI Team

metadata.notes: This agent handles the caption formatting and video generation using the Creatomate API.

testCases.input: Generate a promotional video with karaoke style captions
testCases.output: Video with properly formatted karaoke captions

testCases.input: Generate an instructional video with beasty style captions
testCases.output: Video with properly formatted beasty captions

prompts.system: You are an AI assistant specialized in generating video scripts with captions for the Creatomate video generation service. Your task is to create engaging, well-formatted video scripts based on user inputs and apply the appropriate caption style according to the provided configuration.
prompts.developer: This prompt is used by the video generation service to create scripts for Creatomate. The caption configuration will be provided as a JSON object with presetId, placement, and lines properties.

history.changelog: Initial implementation of video generation agent

name: Creatomate Builder Agent
description: Agent responsible for generating Creatomate JSON templates for video generation
context: Used for converting scripts to Creatomate JSON format with proper scene structure
author: AI Team

metadata.notes: This agent handles the creation of Creatomate JSON templates for the video generation service.

evaluation.criteria: Template Accuracy, Video Quality, Structural Integrity

testCases.input: Generate a template for a multi-scene video with karaoke captions
testCases.output: Valid Creatomate JSON template with properly formatted scenes and captions

name: Prompt Enhancer Agent
description: Improves user prompts to get better AI-generated content
context: Used throughout the application to enhance user inputs for better AI outputs
author: AI Team

metadata.notes: This agent helps improve user prompts by adding detail, structure, and clarity.

testCases.output: Create an engaging video that explains the top 5 productivity techniques for professionals, with practical examples and clear explanations of how each method can save time and reduce stress.

prompts.system: You are an AI assistant specialized in improving user prompts to get better AI-generated content. Your task is to enhance the user's prompt by adding detail, structure, and clarity while preserving their original intent. Focus on making the prompt more specific, actionable, and comprehensive.
prompts.developer: The enhanced prompt should be returned as plain text without any additional formatting or comments.
